text:
For those who set up the gathertown last year, we took the paid option I assume? Were there any gotchas? Did taking the paid option come with extra support, also for the design part?
Ping <@U8MPCDJAY>

elements.text:
For those who set up the gathertown last year, we took the paid option I assume? Were there any gotchas? Did taking the paid option come with extra support, also for the design part?
Ping

text: For JuliaCon, they gave us a paid plan for free, since we were one of the first.

elements.text: For JuliaCon, they gave us a paid plan for free, since we were one of the first.

text: Subsequently, we have paid them for a few smaller events..

elements.text: Subsequently, we have paid them for a few smaller events..

text:
We also used GatherTown for the <#C018UN1FEDD|industry-users> Juliacontributhon

It worked out really well and was fun! Excited to use it again this year
